features: Stay warm in temperatures as low as 25°F/-3C
Coletherm™ Max premium and lightweight fill ​provides better heat retention with less weight and allows bag to pack easily into stuff sack
Compressible stuff sack with side straps that can be cinched to compress the bag; compact size packs up smaller than traditional Coleman® sleeping bags (9.4 x 9 x 15.4 in.)
Semi-sculpted hood helps lock in heat
Thermolock™​ draft tube prevents heat loss through the zipper
ZipPlow™​ patented zipper for snag-free opening and closing
Dimensions: 82 x 32 in., fits campers up to 6 ft. 2 in.
